author: Bill

review: If TV in a box love is possible, then you will find it here.First off, let me start by saying I LOVE THIS! I have tried different streaming media players and none compaired to the Fire TV. Initially, I was under the impression that this unit would be like the others on the market, like the Roku and Apple TV, both which I have tried, but this out performs the competition with out a doubt. I also tried going the Chromecast route, but I was disappointed in the lack of features.Upon opening the box, I was greeted by a black sleek masterpiece and one sleek remote. I grabbed my HDMI cable and set up the Fire to my TV in less than 2 minutes. I turned on the unit and I was pleasantly surprised by the layout. Easy to read and navigate, and the voice feature was spot on.This unit comes pre loaded with apps, such as Amazon, Hulu, Netflix and Pandora to name a few, but here is where the magic begins. Unlike the above mentioned media players, the Fire TV goes above and beyond by letting you download others apps that are not only Amazon apps. This was worth it's weight in gold. I am normally an lover of all things Apple, but this outperforms. The ability to download whatever app you want is amazing; you are not limited by what Amazon allows for content on the Fire like all the other media streaming devices. You can google how to add "unapproved" apps and step by step instructions are available. If your not into adding apps, then this unit stands alone just fine with the preloaded as well.My main objective for buying a streaming media player was to ditch the big monthly cable/dish bill. I was done paying over $80.00 a month. This until paid for itself in one month, and I am excited to say that my monthly TV entertainment bill is $15.00 per month with a subscription to Netflix and Hulu. There are also free apps pre loaded on the Fire that do not require a subscription, which is amazing as well.If you are looking for a seamless and easy to navigate media streaming device then look no further, you will not be disappointed!
